WorkItem.ClosedComment: The status text shows both statuses as Arms/Fury. Because the word "not" is in the text due to Fury being that way, it automatically includes the WARNING message. Arms is fully functional for Cataclysm at this time. Fury is not at all.
WorkItem.Description: hi again just a quick question regarding warrior arms module and that is, is it fully working or not i ask this question due to when first loading rawr 4 the list of modules working arms is listed as fully, yet when you load a char in and select warrior dps, it slams you in the face with red text not cata ready, so can i please be pointed to where i can find out which is actually correct. Thanks again

Comments.Message: It sounds like you might want to actually read that red text that slams you. Not sure though.
